thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 30 of 498
thread.title: Shanon Storms

author: Shanon Storms
title: Shanon Storms
text:
I would like to see a shopping cart that is not directly attached to checking out. I wanted to get a few things at a later date but had to put them in the trash. I will need to go find them again, if I can remember all of the things I chose the first time.
However, this is my second order and I am very excited to receive my products. I ordered more then just my $50 outfit. My first order was seemless and came to my address in a timely manner. Thank you, I look forward to continuing to use your services.
